title: No. 4 Tech drops bout with OU in Amarillo - Texas Tech Red Raiders - TexasTech.com
content: No. 4 Tech drops bout with OU in Amarillo - Texas Tech Red Raiders  TexasTech.com
description: AMARILLO, Texas – No. 4 Texas Tech fell 14-9 to Oklahoma on Tuesday night at Hodgetown. The midweek contest coined the Red Dirt Rivalry goes down in the record book as a nonconference contest despite the Sooners being a Big 12 foe.
